channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump urges Republicans to ‘nationalize the voting’ in 15 states, sowing doubt in elections – US politics live
item.description: US president, who is also due to meet Colombia’s president Gustavo Petro weeks after threatening military action in the country, makes comment on elec...

item.title: Peter Mandelson to step down from Lords as No 10 asks police to investigate Epstein leaks – UK politics live
item.description: Mandelson will still be entitled to call himself Lord but no longer entitled to take part in House of Lords proceedings The Department for Work and Pe...

item.title: French headquarters of Elon Musk’s X raided by Paris cybercrime unit
item.description: Prosecutors’ announcement comes amid a hardening of European attitudes to social media firms Europe live – latest updates Prosecutors have raided the ...

item.title: Marwan Barghouti, ‘Palestine’s Mandela’, to publish book from prison
item.description: Unbroken: In Pursuit of Freedom for Palestine is a collection of writings by the Palestinian political leader, who has been held in Israeli prisons si...

item.title: Pennines delight as drone survey offers hope for one of UK’s rarest birds
item.description: Conservationists find dunlin chicks thriving in boggy habitat created in collaboration with landowners Deep in the Cumbrian Pennines, walkers might be...

item.title: Sarah Ferguson emails to Epstein show increasing desperation
item.description: The messages from the former Duchess of York appear to show her saying she feels "traumatised and alone".

item.title: Prince Edward says it's 'important' to remember victims as pressure on Andrew grows
item.description: The Duke of Edinburgh, Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor's brother, is the first senior royal to speak about the new documents.

item.title: Light aircraft crashes 'with two on board'
item.description: A parachute canopy was later seen caught on a nearby pylon following the crash in Greater Manchester.

item.title: Palace accused of 'messing' with McNeil mental health
item.description: Dwight McNeil's partner criticises Crystal Palace for "messing" with his mental health after the collapse of his transfer from Everton.

item.title: Rew century helps England to Under-19 World Cup final
item.description: Captain Thomas Rew makes a battling century as England book their place in the final of the Under-19 World Cup with a 27-run win over Australia.
